page.title: 07Kings Pond, Alton
page.content:
{Kings pond}is near the{Industrial {Estate. }By the pond there is an old {paper mill}and there's a road nearby called Paper Mill Lane.
Kings pond is now open to the public, and there are{ducks}and{swans which people feed. Kings pond is a very nice place to go for a walk and there's a lot of nature near it, especially at the back of it where there are{butterflies}and{birds. { { }Water from Kings Pond was used in paper making for the industrial estate. There's a sign warning about ducks and swans because so many have been killed by traffic passing by.
